alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Southeastern Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 1:33PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...More snowfall for the Central and Eastern Interior this weekend... A series of weak fronts will bring periods of snow over much of the Central and Eastern Interior beginning Saturday night near Fairbanks and will continue into Monday morning along the ALCAN border. Snowfall totals through Monday morning will generally be in the 1 to 4 inch range, however, a band of heavier snowfall will extend from near Northway to Chicken to Central to Coldfoot to near Atigun Pass. Storm total snowfall in these areas will be in the 4 to 8 inch range. Storm total snowfall from Saturday evening to Monday morning in the Fairbanks area is expected to be in the 2 to 4 inch range, however the higher terrain north and east of Fairbanks can expect 4 to 6 inches through Monday morning.
